trans-unit.source: Defines a command that implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> and is routed through the element tree.

The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> do not contain the application logic for the command as is the case with a typical <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, but rather, these methods raise events that traverse the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>使用一般案例不包含命令的應用程式邏輯<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>，但相反地，這些方法會引發尋找具有物件項目樹狀目錄中周遊的事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.

trans-unit.source: The event handlers attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> contain the command logic.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>包含命令的邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>事件。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
\<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *predefinedClassName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedClassName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined command classes.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個預先定義的命令類別。

trans-unit.source: *predefinedCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *predefinedCommandName*

trans-unit.source: One of the predefined commands.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個預先定義的命令。

trans-unit.source: *customClassName*
trans-unit.target: *customClassName*

trans-unit.source: A custom class which contains the custom command.
trans-unit.target: 包含自訂的命令為自訂類別。

trans-unit.source: Custom classes generally require an `xlmns` prefix mapping; see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 自訂類別，通常需要`xlmns`前置詞對應，請參閱 < [XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: *customCommandName*
trans-unit.target: *customCommandName*

trans-unit.source: A custom command.
trans-unit.target: 自訂的命令。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class.
Declared name for serialization.
The type which is registering the command.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class with the specified name and owner type.
<paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Declared name for serialization.
The type that is registering the command.
Default input gestures associated with this command.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> class with the specified name, owner type, and collection of gestures.
<paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
the length of <paramref name="name" /> is zero
\- or -
<paramref name="ownerType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A user defined data type.
The command target.
Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> can execute in its current state.
<see langword="true" /> if the command can execute on the current command target; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The actual logic that determines if a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute on the current command target is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> methods, rather <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events which tunnel and bubble through element tree looking for a object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 決定如果的實際邏輯<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>可以執行在目前命令目標未包含在<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>事件通道和傳遞項目樹狀目錄中尋找之物件的<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>該<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>找到，則<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>附加至<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic for determining if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute or not.
trans-unit.target: 這些處理常式提供的程式設計邏輯，來判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>可以或不執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>上引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>上未設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>具有鍵盤焦點的項目上引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event handler from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>事件處理常式的自訂實作從<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>。

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` 在此範例是<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令不是`null`，命令會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。

trans-unit.source: If the command is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令不是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，它會轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A>方法呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disable.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法會傳回`true`，則啟用此控制項，; 否則此控制項是停用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
Occurs when changes to the command source are detected by the command manager.
These changes often affect whether the command should execute on the current command target.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> listens for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, which is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>事件，就會引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event is raised whenever conditions are met that may change the whether the command should execute, such as a change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>符合條件時，就會引發事件，可能會變更，是否應該執行的命令，例如鍵盤焦點的變更。

trans-unit.source: When the command receives the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, it raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 當收到命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>便會產生事件，<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the command source will listen for this event and query the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，命令來源將會接聽這個事件與查詢<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>透過<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Most command sources will disable themselves if the command cannot be executed, as part of their command binding.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的命令來源如果會停用本身無法執行命令，做為其命令繫結的一部分。

trans-unit.source: An example of this is when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> grays itself out when the command cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，這是當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>灰色本身時，無法執行命令。

trans-unit.source: In some situations, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is unaware of a change in conditions that alters the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>不會察覺條件的變更會改變執行命令的能力。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, you can force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method, this will in turn cause the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，您可以強制<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>來引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>藉由呼叫事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>方法，這會依次導致<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecuteChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event handler from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>事件處理常式的自訂實作從<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>。

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` 在此範例是<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.Command%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令不是`null`，命令會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。

trans-unit.source: If the command is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令不是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，它會轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A>方法呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>方法會傳回`true`，再啟用此控制項; 否則，請停用的控制項。

trans-unit.source: User defined parameter to be passed to the handler.
Element at which to begin looking for command handlers.
Executes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> on the current command target.
The actual logic that executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is not contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 執行的實際邏輯<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>並未包含在<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events, which tunnel and bubble through the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> 引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>事件通道和反昇到項目尋找的物件樹狀<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>該<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>找到，則<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>附加至<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 這些處理常式提供執行的程式設計邏輯<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>上引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>上未設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>具有鍵盤焦點的項目上引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example is from a custom implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> sample.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例取自的自訂實作<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>範例。

trans-unit.source: `this.Command` in this example is the Command property on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>.
trans-unit.target: `this.Command` 在此範例是命令屬性上<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the command is not null, the command is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令不是 null，此命令會轉型為<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，然後在<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>方法呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, it is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute%2A> method is called passing the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令不是<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>，它會轉換為<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute%2A>方法呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandParameter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputGesture" /> objects that are associated with this command.
The input gestures.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的筆勢。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將新<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>至<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the command.
The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used when referencing a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 參考時，就可以使用這個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is registered with the command.
The type of the command owner.
trans-unit.target: 命令的擁有者的類型。

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <see langword="null" />.
For a description of this members, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute(System.Object)" />.
<see langword="true" /> if this command can be executed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <see langword="null" />.
For a description of this members, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object)" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱
